document.full_text: the trustee in charge of liquidating what's left of lehman brothers holdings inc  u.s. brokerage agreed to pay barclays plc  $1.1 billion in disputed assets connected to its purchase of lehman's north american business.
document.title: lehman, barclays in $1.1 billion accord on assets
lines_and_colors: the trustee in charge of liquidating what's left of lehman brothers holdings inc  u.s. brokerage agreed to pay barclays plc  $1.1 billion in disputed assets connected to its purchase of lehman's north american business.
